pr_title: Provide options to enable/disable shutdown and restart server from management console

timeline.message:
Provide options to enable/disable shutdown and restart server from management console
Fix https://github.com/wso2/product-ei/issues/5147

timeline.bodyText:
disableShutdownRestartFromUI.disableShutdown
This property does not make sense same information is there "disableShutdownRestart" , "disableShutdown"any Shall we change it
ex: shutdownFromUI.enable=false
timeline.author: milindaperera

replies.bodyText:
The relevant configuration would be as follows.
<disableShutdownRestartFromUI> <disableShutdown>true</disableShutdown> <disableRestart>true</disableRestart> </disableShutdownRestartFromUI>
replies.author: dulanjalidilmi
